author: mandrenguyen
body:
Adding MC workflows to test --era Run2_2017 with --scenario Heavyions.
Adding wfs are 150, 150.1, 150.2 and 150.3
The latter 3 are migrated from Run 1 wfs 140.1, 140.2 and 140.4
All Hydjet MinBias wfs have been changed to Hydjet impact parameter = 12 fm, which will take care of the memory limitations in running heavy-ion events in relval.
The event overlay wfs (300-302) have not been migrated yet.  This will wait for when b=12 GEN-SIM has been produced in a pre-release relval.  

The validation and DQM sequences also had to be brought into sync with their pp Phase I equivalents. 
To get these sequences to run I modified the heavy-ion HCAL local reco such that it now runs both hbheprereco and hbhereco, as is the case in pp.
I'm not really sure why this was ever different in the first place though. 
Feedback on this would be appreciated.
title: Add Phase I heavy-ion relval workflows
